correctly & clean if

Maintenance
Checklist

Maintenance
Checklist

Figure 7

Figure 13

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

MAIN MACHINE

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

-

-

Check the condition of
table and ensure free
of wood chips, pieces
of fragmented plastic
and other foreign
objects. Ensure
condition of table is
that so no
contamination will
occur. Repair surface if
any damage to
surface.
Check the condition of
belt and ensure free of
fray. Ensure condition
of belt is that so no
contamination will
occur. Trim with cutter
knife if any signs of
wear.
Check for excessive
wear.

If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Controlled Copy

MAINTENANCE PLAN

DMF & LYS STAND UP POUCH MAKING MACHINE

Product Safety & Quality Management System

Operations Manager

Michael Schlachter
